short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the colors of websites, images, and videos. Do not use if you have epilepsy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do not use this if you have epilepsy.

Animates the colors of websites, including images and videos, so that the colors are always changing. There are several controls for customizing the animations.
